definition: to make to order/to have sth made to order
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance

sentences.english: Tailor your presentations; don't be generic.
sentences.chinese: 量身订做你的自我陈述，不要大众化。

sentences.english: Siyitu Guangzhou , factory outlets, wholesale customized.
sentences.chinese: 广州思衣图服饰，厂家直销，订做批发。

sentences.english: Horwath International member firms create customized solutions for every client.
sentences.chinese: 浩华国际会员所为每个客户度身订做独特的方案。

sentences.english: Let us can offer the high quality product and service with your compa…
sentences.chinese: 让我们能为贵公司提供量身订做的优质产品。

sentences.english: Multiple modes can be made according to customer's demand for various models of color flash.
sentences.chinese: 还可根据客户的需求订做各种型号彩色卡扣。

sentences.english: Can also be custom-made fasteners according to user needs.
sentences.chinese: 还可根据用户需要订做紧固件。

sentences.english: They've invited all their friends (but only the four that know how to scuba dive are going to attended. ) Lillian had a special white wedding wetsuit made.
sentences.chinese: 莉莉安订做了一件特别的白色婚礼用保温潜水服。

sentences.english: Special specifications may be root tree customer incoming sample custom.
sentences.chinese: 特殊规格可根椐客户来样订做。

sentences.english: To undertake the special kinds of non-standard cylinders and customized product design, Welcome!
sentences.chinese: 承接各种非标气缸与特殊产品设计订做，欢迎惠顾。

sentences.english: We can customize our gem polishers to suit your needs.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以订做宝石磨光机，以符合你们的要求。

sentences.english: Prosthestist, Bill Dykes says each of these prostheses are individually made for each patient.
sentences.chinese: 义肢师父比尔说，义肢都是为每个人量身订做的。

sentences.english: We need to order several crates for packing the all-terrain vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要订做数个板条箱来装这些全地形传动车。

sentences.english: Variations of inner decoration can differ and can be ordered individually.
sentences.chinese: 飞机内部装饰可以根据个人喜好订做。

sentences.english: Is it possible for you to custom-make this long sofa for me?
sentences.chinese: 有可能为我订做这样的一个长沙发吗？

sentences.english: Applicable to high-precision mass production, can also build special customer requirements.
sentences.chinese: 适用于高精度大批量生产，也可按客户要求特殊订做。

sentences.english: We may produce nonstandard and special size LED products.
sentences.chinese: 我厂可承接非标及特型LED照明产品的加工订做。

definition: to have something made to order
custom-made/made-to-order/to have something custom made/also written 定製|定制
lit. measure the body then tailor the suit (idiom); fig. to act according to actual circumstances/To live within one's means.
to celebrate a birthday/to give a birthday party
